com.kalixia.tapestry.perf4j.components.Graphs

Component displaying the list of graphs that are available (in a combo box) and dynamically updating the generated graph based on the selected graph name. Individual graph can be generated with the com.kalixia.tapestry.perf4j.components.Graph component.

[JavaDoc]
